document.heading: Construction and Demolition Waste Recycling Accountability Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-294, the “Construction and Demolition Waste Recycling Accountability Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-1032. The Bill was adopted on first reading on December 4, 2012. Signed by the Mayor on January 31, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-662 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-294 became effective on April 27, 2013.
